price: 46. (Al-lah) les dijo: “No teman. Yo estaré con ustedes escuchándolo y observándolo (todo).
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
